name: My Real Token (MRT)
description:
My Real Token (MRT) is a next-generation digital asset designed to power the decentralized economy of Web3 and DeFi. It serves as a multi-utility token enabling seamless interaction across decentralized platforms, financial tools, and blockchain-based applications.   
MRT aims to bridge the gap between real-world utility and decentralized ecosystems. By supporting transparency, scalability, and user empowerment, MRT provides the infrastructure for a new wave of decentralized applications and financial protocols.
